SA15bsa071_u:2: (1.1) parokṣārthapratipatteranumānāśrayatvādeva tad vyutpādanārtha saṃkṣepata idamārabhyate- pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetustridhaiva saḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:10: dharmavacanenāpi parāśrayatvād dharmasya dharmyāśrayasiddhau pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadharmiṇa eva siddhiriti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:13: siddhe tadaṃśavyāptyā dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sattve punardharmiṇo vacanaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇa eva yo dharmaḥ sa heturiti niyamārthamāśaṃkyeta /
SA15bsa071_u:14: dṛṣṭaṃ sajātīya eva sattvam ityavadhāraṇena sādhyābhāve siddhe 'pi vyatireke sādhyābhāve asattvavacanam,
SA15bsa071_u:15: tathehāpi tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt siddhe 'pi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sattve tatraiva bhāvaniyamārtha dharmivacanamāśaṃkyeta /
SA15bsa071_u:16: tasmāt sāmarthyād arthapratītāvapi upacāramātrāt samānanirdeśāt pratipattigauravaṃ ca parihṛtaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:24: (1.4) tasya vyāptirhi vyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva /
SA15bsa071_u:26: etena anvayo vyatireko vā pakṣadharmaśca yathāsvaṃ pramāṇena niścita uktaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:29: (1.5) tatra pakṣadharmasya sādhyadharmiṇi pratyakṣato 'numānato vā prasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:32: sadhūmaṃ hi pradeśamarthāntaraviviktarūpamasādhāraṇātmanā dṛṣṭavataḥ smārtaṃ yathādṛṣṭabheda viṣayaṃ liṅgajñānamutpadyate /
SA15bsa071_u:34: (1.6) tasmiṃstathābhūte darśanena dṛṣṭesati sa yena yenāsādhāraṇastadasādhāraṇatāṃ tato bhedamabhilapantī atadvayāvṛtiviṣayā smṛtirutpatrā pratyakṣabalena na pramāṇam /
SA15bsa071_u:39: arthakriyārthī hi sarvaḥ prekṣāvān pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ vānveṣate /
SA15bsa071_u:40: na ca sāmānyaṃ svalakṣaṇapratipatterūrdhvaṃ tatsāmarthyotpatravikalpavijñānagrāhyaṃ kāñcidarthakriyāmupakalpayati /
SA15bsa071_u:44: na ca tatsvalakṣaṇagrahaṇottarakālabhāvino nīlavikalpasya viṣayeṇa nīlasādhyārthakriyā kriyate /
SA15bsa071_u:45: (1.7) tasmāt anadhigatārthaviṣayaṃ pramāṇam ityapi anadhigate svalakṣaṇe iti viśeṣaṇīyam /
SA15bsa071_u:46: adhigate tu svalakṣaṇe tatsāmarthyajanmā vikalpastadanukārī kāryatastadviṣayatvāt smṛtireva,
SA15bsa071_u:52: tato 'pi vikalpāt vastunyeva tadadhyavasāyena puruṣasya pravṛtteḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:57: sādhāraṇe hi kārye na teṣāṃ sāmarthyabhedaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:66: satsu apyanyeṣu hetuṣu asyābhāve na bhavatīti yastadbhāve bhāvastadabhāve 'bhāvaśca pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tasya siddhiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:67: kāryakāraṇabhāva eva hyarthāntarasya evaṃ syāt- yatra dhūmastatrāvaśyamagniriti,
SA15bsa071_u:68: agnibhāva eva hi bhāvo dhūmasya tatkāryatvamiti /
SA15bsa071_u:73: anuddiṣṭaviṣayaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvakhyāpanaṃ pratibandhamātrasiddhau sidhyatīti na tatra vyatirekasādhane anupalabdhyoḥ dṛśyaviṣayatāviśeṣaṇamapekṣyate /
SA15bsa071_u:84: aparāparavyāvṛttibhedena dharmabhede satyapi vastutaḥ liṅgasvabhāva eva /
SA15bsa071_u:85: hetusvabhāve sādhyadharme 'nvayavyabhicārābhāvāt lakṣaṇe tanmātrānvayeneti viśeṣaṇaṃ paramatāpekṣam /
SA15bsa071_u:87: tena ca viśeṣaṇena tathavidhasya atatsvabhāvatāṃ tasmin sādhye hetorvyabhicāraṃ cāha /
SA15bsa071_u:91: yathā yat sat tat sarvaṃ kṣaṇikam /
SA15bsa071_u:94: tathā, kṣaṇikatvābhāve sattvābhāvaḥ saṃśca śabda iti /
SA15bsa071_u:96: (2.3) atra pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrasāmarthyādeva pratijñārthasya pratīteḥ na pratijñāyāḥ prayoga upadarśitaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:99: pradeśasthaṃ dhūmamupalabdhavataḥ tasyāgninā vyāpteḥ smaraṇe tatsāmarthyādeva agniratra iti pratijñārthapratītirbhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:100: na ca tatra kaścit agniratreti asmai nivedayati /
SA15bsa071_u:102: pramāṇamantareṇaivaṃ pratīteḥ nimittābhāvāt pratītau liṅgasya vaiyarthyam /
SA15bsa071_u:103: svayamevākasmāt agniratreti vyavasthāpya tatpratipattaye paścālliṅgamanusaratīti ko 'yaṃ pratipatteḥ kramaḥ?
SA15bsa071_u:107: yadi pratītiranyathā na syāttadā sarvaṃ śobheta /
SA15bsa071_u:108: tasmādeṣa svayaṃpratītau kenacid viṣayopasthāpakena vināpi pratiyan asmān kāryiṇo dṛṣṭvā parvabrāhmaṇa iva vyaktaṃ mūlyaṃ mṛgayate /
SA15bsa071_u:109: asmadvacanādapi svayaṃ siddhameva liṅgamanusṛtya sādhyaṃ pratyetīti ko 'nayoravasthayorviśeṣaḥ?
SA15bsa071_u:110: dṛṣṭā ca pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrāt sādharmyavatprayogādeḥ pratijñāvacanamantareṇāpi pratītiriti kastasyopayogaḥ?
SA15bsa071_u:112: tatra svayaṃ prameyopadarśanena vināpi pratipadya paraṃ pratipādayatrapūrva kramamāśrayate iti kimatra kāraṇam?
SA15bsa071_u:116: ḍiṇḍikarāgaṃ parityajyākṣiṇī nimīlya cintaya tāvat kimiyatā pratītiḥ syātra veti /
SA15bsa071_u:119: (2.5) atra pūrvaṃ hetuḥ prayoktavyaḥ paścād dṛṣṭānta iti kramaniyamo 'pi na kaścit /
SA15bsa071_u:123: nahi atatsvabhāvasya bhāve ekāntenānyasya bhāvaḥ kṛtakatvasya bhāve prayatnānantarīyakatvavat /
SA15bsa071_u:126: tasmādanvayavyatirekayoryathālakṣaṇameko 'pi prayokto dvitīyamākṣipatīti naikatraṃ sādhanavākye dvayoḥ prayogaḥ iṣyate vaiyarthyāt /
SA15bsa071_u:129: tadabhāva eva hetorabhāvakhyātiryathā syāt nānyatra vipakṣe viruddhe vā iti niyamakhyāpanārtho 'pi vyatirekaprayogo na yuktaḥ,
SA15bsa071_u:131: (2.7) kathamidam avagamyate sadavaśyaṃ naśvarasvabhāvamiti yena anvayavyatirekasambhava iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:133: svabhāvata eva bhāvā naśvarāḥ naiṣāṃ svahetubhyo niṣpatrānāmanyato vināśotpattiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:135: na hi vināśaheturbhāvasya svabhāvameva karoti tasya svahetubhyo nirvṛtteḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:141: bhāvapratiṣedhakaraṇe na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalamiti /
SA15bsa071_u:142: evaṃ ca kartā na bhavatītyakarturahetutvamiti na vināśahetuḥ kaścit /
SA15bsa071_u:144: yadi svabhāvato naśvaraḥ svātmanyanavasthāyī bhāvaḥ tasya na kiñcinnāśakāraṇaiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:146: yo hi yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetoreva utpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati,
SA15bsa071_u:149: na hi prakāśādayastadātmāna utpannāḥ punaḥ prakāśādibhāve hetvantaramapekṣante /
SA15bsa071_u:151: tadvadasthitidharmā cet svabhāvato bhāvo niṣpanno na punastadātmatāyāṃ hetvantaramapekṣate /
SA15bsa071_u:159: bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānyathātvābhāvāt tatsvabhāvasya paścādiva prāgāpi jananaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa071_u:161: pūrvabhāvinastu avasthāviśeṣā aṅkurakāraṇasya kāraṇāni iti nānekāntaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:163: (2.10) yadi te 'ntyāḥ samarthāḥ kiṃ na janayanti pratyekamiti /
SA15bsa071_u:166: na vai bhāvānāṃ kācit prekṣāpūrvakāritā yataḥ ayamasmāsvanyatamo 'pi samarthaḥ kimasmābhiḥ kartavyam ityālocyāpare nivarteran /
SA15bsa071_u:169: te samarthāḥ kiṃ nāparāparaṃ janayantīti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:170: na, tatraiva sāmarthyāt tasyaivaikasya janane samarthā nānyasyeti nāparāparajananam /
SA15bsa071_u:171: (2.11) bhinnasvabhāvebhyaścakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhya ekakāryotpattau na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāditi cet /
SA15bsa071_u:174_0: yathā mṛtpiṇḍakulālasūtrā dibhyo bhavato ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍādamṛtsvabhāvebhyo vṛkṣādibhyo
SA15bsa071_u:174_1: bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ kulālāttasyaiva mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ saṃsthāviśeṣātmatayā tadanyebhyo
SA15bsa071_u:174_2: bhinnaḥ sūtrāttasyaiva mṛtsaṃsthāna viśeṣātmanaḥ cakrādervibhaktaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:177: na ca tayoḥ śāktiviśeṣaviṣayabhede 'pi tajjanitaviśeṣabhedasya kāryasya svabhāvena bhedaḥ mṛtsaṃsthānayoraparasparātmatayā saṃsthānamṛdrūpābhyāṃ tayorapratibhāsanaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa071_u:178: (2.12) anyadeva saṃsthānaṃ guṇo mṛddravyāt tena bhinnasvabhāvaḥ kulālamṛtpiṇḍayorupayogaviśeṣa iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:180: api ca yadi saṃsthānaṃ bhinnaṃ mṛdaḥ kulālaḥ kiṃ na pṛthakkaroti?
SA15bsa071_u:181: guṇasya dravyaparatantratvāt sa kathaṃ pṛthak kriyeta?
SA15bsa071_u:187: anyathā mṛtpiṇḍasya svabhāvata eva tathāvidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatve vastuna eva prāgapi yogyatālakṣaṇā dharmatāstīti saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syāditi /
SA15bsa071_u:188: evaṃ tarthi sā yogyatā mṛddravyasya kulālād bhavatīti nānayoḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:190: asti tāvadekasvabhāvatve 'pi ekasyānekapratyayopādheyaviśeṣateti kiṃ mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ ekasvabhāvatvasādhanāya atinirbandhena /
SA15bsa071_u:191: (2.13) tena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayā naikopayogaviṣayāḥ kāryasyaikasvabhāvatve 'pi vastuta iti yatheha kāraṇabhedo bhinnaviśeṣopayogāt naikakāryaḥ,
SA15bsa071_u:193_2: 'pi vastutaḥ kāryasya kāraṇānāṃ bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhvantīti
SA15bsa071_u:194: ta evaite kāraṇaśaktibhedā yathāsvaṃ prativiśiṣṭakāryajanane 'vyavadheyaśaktitayā pratyupasthitāḥ kṣaṇikatvātsāmagrīkāryasya svabhāvasthityāśrayaityucyante /
SA15bsa071_u:195: tathāhi tattebhyaḥ samastebhyaḥ upalambhātmakaṃ rūpagrahaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ viṣayarūpaṃ ceti prativiśiṣṭasvabhāvamekameva jātam /
SA15bsa071_u:196: (2.14) apratirodhaśaktikeṣu anantarakāryeṣu anādheyaviśeṣeṇu kṣaṇikeṣu pratyayeṣu parasparaṃ kaḥ sahakārārthaḥ?
SA15bsa071_u:197: na vai sarvatrātiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā kā tarhi?
SA15bsa071_u:202: tatra ca kṣaṇe ekasya svabhāvasyāvivekād viśeṣasya kartumaśakyatvāt,
SA15bsa071_u:207: te samarthā eva svabhāvato 'ntyāḥ pratyayāḥ saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ prākpaścātpṛthagbhāvo nāsti,
SA15bsa071_u:213: kadācidanyathāpi syuḥ tataścaiko 'pi kvacit janayed iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:214: aparāpara pratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yadyapi kutaścitsāmyātsarūpāḥ pratīyante tathāpi bhitra evaiṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:216: tatra yo 'vyavadhanādideśo rūpendriyādikalāpaḥ sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:217_0: yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣaḥ sa taddhetujanane samarthaḥ
SA15bsa071_u:217_1: teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścātra pṛthagbhāva iti samarthānapi pūrvāparapṛthagbhāvbhāvino doṣā nopalīyante /
SA15bsa071_u:218: tena yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādihetuḥ sa samarthasya heturiti tatra na kadācidanyathābhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:219: (2.16) anena nyāyena sarvatra hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamo draṣṭavyaḥ pratikṣaṇamanyānyasvabhāvabhedānvayinīṣu śaktiṣu,
SA15bsa071_u:222: anyasahitaḥ karoti na kevala iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:227: kuvindādayaḥ paṭādikriyāyāṃ samarthā api na sarvatra kurvantīti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:228: krīḍanaśīlo devānāṃ priyaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ kṛtamapi punaḥ punaḥ kārayati,
SA15bsa071_u:231: antyāvasthāyāṃ prāgasamarthasya sāmarthyotpattau tasya sāmarthyasya tatsvabhāvatve 'pūrvotpattirevasā /
SA15bsa071_u:232: atatsvabhāvatve saḥ akāraka eva sāmarthyākhyātpadārthāntarāt kāryotpattyabhyupagamāt /
SA15bsa071_u:233: (2.17) api ca yo 'sau sakaleṣu sahakāriṣu karoti sa tadaiva kasmāt karoti /
SA15bsa071_u:235: aho mahāsāmarthyaṃ mahāprabhāvasya darśanaṃ yasmādatatsvabhāvān api bhāvān svabhāvamātreṇa nānāprakāreṣu vyāpāreṣu niyuṅkte /
SA15bsa071_u:236: yadi nāma kiñcit kathañcidatrabhavato darśanaviṣayatām atikrāmet,
SA15bsa071_u:237: hanta aprasavadharmakamapetasantānaṃ syaditīyaṃ cintā cittaṃ dunoti /
SA15bsa071_u:238: na vai vayam atatsvabhāvānāṃ bhāvānām asmaddarśanavaśāt kāryakriyāṃ brūmaḥ kintu svabhāvenaiva te kāryakāraṇadharmāḥ,
SA15bsa071_u:239: tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe te ete kārakasvabhāvā iti /
SA15bsa071_u:241: svabhāvasteṣāṃ kāryakriyādharmā tena samastapratyayānāmakṛtvā kāryaṃ nopekṣāpattiriti /
SA15bsa071_u:242: so 'kṣepakriyādharmā svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadaivāntyāvasthāyāmutpanna āhosvit prāgapyāsīt?
SA15bsa071_u:244: tatkimidānīṃ mātā ca vandhyā ca asti?
SA15bsa071_u:245: ko vāsya bhāṣitasyārthaḥ- akṣepakriyāsvabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ ca na karotīti /
SA15bsa071_u:246: (2.19) sahitaḥ svakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ na kevala iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:249: na hi sa sāhitye 'pi pararūpeṇa kartā syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:250: svarūpaṃ ca tasya prāgapi tadeveti kathaṃ kadacit kriyāvirāmaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:251: yasyāpi bhāvah kṣaṇikaḥ tasyāpi kasmāt kevalo na karoti?
SA15bsa071_u:257: yaśca bhavati sa eva na bhavatīti nāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ kārakākārakayoḥ svabhāvataddhetvorvirodhāt /
SA15bsa071_u:258: (2.20) yo 'pi manyate- akṣepakriyādharmaiva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ,
SA15bsa071_u:260: kāryaṃ tu pratyayāntarāpekṣamiti sahitebhya eva jāyate na kevalebhya iti,
SA15bsa071_u:261: tasyāpi kathaṃ- sa bhāvaḥ kevalo 'pi karotyeva?
SA15bsa071_u:262: kāryaṃ ca tasmātrotpadyate iti tadavastho virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:267: kāryaṃ cāyaṃ kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ san paramapekṣamāṇaṃ kathamupekṣeta?
SA15bsa071_u:269: evaṃ hi anenātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:270: kāryaṃ paramapekṣata iti tataḥ kevalād anutpattimasya kathayasi sa kevalo 'pi samarthasvabhāva iti tataḥ utpattiṃ brūṣe,
SA15bsa071_u:274: na tu akṣaṇikānāṃ yeṣāṃ pṛthagapi bhāvaḥ sambhavati pṛthak kāryakaraṇasambhavena sahakāritvaniyamāyogāt /
SA15bsa071_u:275: (2.21) yatra tu santānopakāreṇa bhāvāḥ hetutāṃ pratipadyante,
SA15bsa071_u:277: tatra santānāśrayeṇa viśeṣotpādanaṃ pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate na dravyāśrayeṇa,
SA15bsa071_u:279: nahi taṇḍulādīnāṃ viśeṣānutpattau dahanādibhāve 'pi odanajanma syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:280: tathā prabhāsvarādapavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo 'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyeta tadā prāgivārthapratilpattiṃ naiva janayet /
SA15bsa071_u:281: akṣepakāriṣu indriyādiṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:282: tatra yathāsvaṃ pratyayaiḥ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayairye yogyadeśādyavasthā jātāste saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyante ityekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvam /
SA15bsa071_u:283: (2.22) yatra tu viśeṣamutpādayantaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayāḥ tatra hetusantānaḥ pratyayāntarāṇyapekṣata iti tataḥ svabhāvāntarasya pratilambhaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:284: tatra svarasataḥ hetupratyayānāṃ pūrvopanipātakṣaṇānāṃ nivṛttau tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpattirevaṃ krameṇa yāvadatyantātiśayavato 'ntyakāraṇakalāpāt kāryotpattiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:287: tataśca parasparaviśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvīran /
SA15bsa071_u:292: na ca sahakāriṇaḥ parasparakāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane nityaṃ yogyāvasthāḥ,
SA15bsa071_u:295: tenādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakāribhyo nirupakārasya notpadyata iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:296: nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punarabhidhāne 'pi kaścidudvego bhavati yadyevamapi lokasya nyāyapratītirbhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:298: na viśeṣotpādanāt sahakāriṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ paramārthataḥ sambhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:300: (2.24) atha kathamekārthakriyāpi bhavet sāpi na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām /
SA15bsa071_u:303: tathāca, tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlaṃ kāryamapi kevalāt syāditi cet /
SA15bsa071_u:304: atroktamuttaraṃ pratikṣaṇamaparāparaiḥ pratyayaiḥ yathā bhāvasantāne viśeṣasyotpattiḥ,
SA15bsa071_u:309: kāryadvaividhyaṃ ca sahakāribhiḥ akṣepakārindriyavijñānavacca kāryakāraṇayoḥ svabhāvabhedāditi sarvamuktam /
SA15bsa071_u:310: (2.25) tatra sahakāribhyaḥ santānopakārāpekṣakāraṇakāryajanmani sahakāriṇāmādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakārikṛtaviśeṣajanmā na bhavati,
SA15bsa071_u:312: tataḥ ye viśeṣā jāyante te tajjanmānaḥ tatprakṛtitvāditi nānavasthā /
SA15bsa071_u:316: tadā pṛthagbhāvasya sambhavātkevalo 'pi tathā syād ityuktam /
SA15bsa071_u:318: tasmādakṣaṇikānāṃ kāraṇānām ekārthakriyayā na kaścit sahakāritvaniyamaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:319: nāpi santatyopakāreṇeti na tasya kaścitsahakārīti kevalo 'pi kuryāt /
SA15bsa071_u:320: prāyastu saṃghātasthāyī bhāvasantānaḥ sahakāripratyayairupajanitaviśeṣaḥ svakāryaṃ kurvan dṛṣṭo bījādivat /
SA15bsa071_u:323: (2.26) tasmādyo yadātmā sa svasattāmātreṇa tādṛśo bhavati na bhūtvā tadbhāve parābhisaṃskāramapekṣata iti svabhāvato 'sthitidharmaṇo bhāvasya na kiñcitrāśakāraṇaiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:324: sthitidharmaṇo 'pi bhāvasya na nāśakāraṇaiḥ kiñcit svabhāvānyathātvasya kenacit kartumaśakyatvāt /
SA15bsa071_u:325: tadanyathātvapratipattau sa tatsvabhāva eva na syāditi pūrva eva vikalpaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:327: yaśca parasmādanyathābhāvaḥ so 'paraḥ svabhāvaḥ yaścāparaḥ sa kathaṃ tasya syāt?
SA15bsa071_u:329: tathā ca yaḥ sthitidharmā jātaḥ na tasyānyathābhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:330: etena kaṭhinādīnāṃ tāmrādīnām agnyādeḥ dravatvādisvabhāvāntarotpattiḥ pratyuktā /
SA15bsa071_u:331: tatrāpi pūrvakasya svarasanirodhitvādvināśe 'gnyāderupādānāccāpara eva dravādisvabhāvaḥ utpannaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:337: nedaṃ vikalpadvayamatikrāmati - kiṃ nityo bhāva utānityaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:338: prāṅnityo bhūtvā paścādanityo bhavatīti ca bruvāṇo bhāvadvayaṃ cāha nityānityasvabhāvabhedam /
SA15bsa071_u:339: prāktanasya nityābhimatasya svabhāvasya svayaṃ nāśaṃ bruvāṇaḥ sarvadaiva nāśamanāśaṃ ca prāheti pūrvasmin vināśaheturasamartha eva /
SA15bsa071_u:344: sa tarhi bhāvaḥ svabhāvena nāśamanāviśan kathaṃ naṣṭo nāma?
SA15bsa071_u:346: tasmāt satyasya vināśe vināśasvabhāvena tena bhavitavyaṃ,
SA15bsa071_u:348: tena svabhāvato naścare 'naśvare vā bhāve na vināśahetorupayogaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:349: (2.28) tasmādvināśaṃ pratyanapekṣo bhāvastadbhāvaniyataḥ iti yaḥ san sa vināśī naśvaratāyā nivṛttau sattvanivṛtirityanvayavyatirekasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:351: na hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāva iti na tatribandhanānvayavyatirekāsiddhiriti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:357: itthaṃ ca yat sattat kṣaṇikameveti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:363: tasmāt kāryaṃ svabhāvairyāvadbhiravinābhāvi kāraṇe teṣāṃ hetuḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:365: taireva ca dharmairye tairvinā na bhavanti /
SA15bsa071_u:367: na, tajjanyaviśeṣagrahaṇe 'bhimatatvāt liṅga viśeṣopādhīnāṃ ca sāmānyānām /
SA15bsa071_u:373: tatra yadi dhūmo 'gnyādisāmagjyā anyato 'pi bhavettadā tasya tajjanyaḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti sakṛdapi tato na bhavet /
SA15bsa071_u:377: na ca dhūmasya tadatajjanyaḥ svabhāvo yuktaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:382: tasmādyo dhūmajananaḥ so 'gnyādisāmagrīviśeṣo yaḥ agnyādisāmagrīviśeṣeṇa janitaḥ sa eva dhūmo bhavatīti kāryakāraṇayorevaṃ svabhāvasya niyamāt tadvijātīyādutpattirna bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:383: tadyādṛśaṃ kāryaṃ yādṛśāt kāraṇād dṛṣṭamekadā tattanna vyabhicarati /
SA15bsa071_u:384: tena siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryasya kāraṇena vyāptiḥ siddhā bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:385: (3.3) nanu vijātīyādapi kiñcid bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ tadyathā go mayādeḥ śālūkādiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:390: na hi ākāratulyataiva bhāvānāṃ tattve nimittam,
SA15bsa071_u:392: anyathā hi vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagrayā avilakṣaṇakāryotpattau na kāraṇabhedābhedābhyāṃ kāryabhedābhedāvityahetukau viśvasya bhedābhedau syātām /
SA15bsa071_u:393: tathā hi na bhedādbheda iti abhedādapi nābhedaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:394: tadvyatiriktaśca na kaścidbhāvasvabhāva ityahetukatvādbhāvānāṃ nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:401: tajjananasvabhāvavilakṣaṇādapi tasyotpattau na tajjananaśaktipratiniyama iti yat kiñcit yataḥ kutaścitsyāt /
SA15bsa071_u:402: tajjananaśaktisāmye tu tadeveti na kāryaṃ duṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyabhicarati /
SA15bsa071_u:410: yatra yasmitrupalabhyamāne niyamena yasyopalabdhiḥ bhavati yogyatāyā aviśeṣāt satatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ ekajñānasaṃsargāt /
SA15bsa071_u:414: sa kevalastadapekṣayā tadanyaśceducyate tadā tajjñānaṃ tatsvabhāvo vā jñātṛjñeya dharmalakṣaṇānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:417: uktamatra yathā paryudāsavṛttyāpekṣātaḥ tadvivikto 'rthastajjñānaṃ vābhāvo 'nupalabdhiścocyata iti /
SA15bsa071_u:423: (4.3) sa evānyabhāvastadviṣayā copalabdhistadabhāvasya kiṃ na sādhanam?
SA15bsa071_u:424: kiṃ punarabhāvasya siddhireva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ? iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:427: yatsiddhau yasya na siddhistattasya liṅgaṃ bhavati dhūmāgnivat /
SA15bsa071_u:430: (4.4) sambandhābhāvācca tacca tasya liṅgaṃ yadi syāt,
SA15bsa071_u:432: yathā kṛtakatvasyānityatvena ekārthasamavāyo dhūmasya vā liṅginaikārthasamavāyaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:434: naivaṃ kaścid bhāvābhāvayoḥ sambandhaḥ yenāsyānyabhāvaḥ sādhanaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:436: śabdārthayoḥ tatpratipādanābhiprāye sati tatprayogāt kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇo 'vinābhāvalakṣaṇo vā sambandhaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:437: ayaṃ cātra na sambhavati yataḥ viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:438: siddhe hi tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve tanmukhena viṣayaviṣabhibhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:439: sa eva cāsati sambandhe na sidhyati /
SA15bsa071_u:442: tathā ca ghaṭābhāvastadanyabhāvāt iti ghaṭasya sarvatra sarvadā cābhāvaḥ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa071_u:443: na, pradeśādirdharmī ghaṭābhāvena viśeṣyata iti tadviśeṣaṇabhūto 'bhāvaḥ sādhyate na tu kevalaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:448: yatraiva hi pradeśādau yatrāstīti ucyate sa eva tenāsaṃsṛṣṭo 'nyabhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:449: taddarśanādevāsya ghaṭo nāsti iti vikalpo bhavati iti kathaṃ tasyaiva liṅgaliṅgibhāvaḥ?
SA15bsa071_u:450: (4.6) na cātra sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvakalpanā sambhavati yena sāmānyaṃ heturbhaved viśeṣo dharmāti,
SA15bsa071_u:453: na ca yatra pradeśamātraṃ tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:454: tādṛśe kevale pradeśe sarvatrābhāva iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:456: sa ca tatpratipattāveva siddha iti kasya idānīṃ talliṅgam?
SA15bsa071_u:459: (4.7) asti virodhaḥ sambandhaḥ tato 'nyabhāvādabhāvasya siddhiḥ iti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:460: kena kasya virodho 'nyabhāvena pratiyoginaḥ kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī pramātumiṣṭo yena liṅgaliṅganorvirodhaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt?
SA15bsa071_u:465: (4.8) nanu anyabhāvatadabhāvayorasati sambandhe 'nyabhāvagatyāpi tadabhāvagatirna syāditi cet /
SA15bsa071_u:466: na vai kutaścit sambandhādanyabhāvastadabhāvagamaka iṣṭaḥ kintu anyabhāva eva tadabhāvo yathoktaṃ prāk /
SA15bsa071_u:467: tasyānyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya kevalasyaikātmavyasthitasya tadātmanā pariccedasyaivānyavyavaccedatvāt tasya kaivalyamevāparasya vaikalyamiti tadanyabhāva eva tadabhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:469: anyathā tasya pariccedena tato 'nyasya avyavaccede tatparicceda eva na syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:471: ya eva vyavahāraḥ kasyacitkvaceddeśe darśanāt prāptiparihārārthaḥ sa na syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:472: na hyayamanalaṃ paśyatrapi kevalam analameva paśyatīti kathaṃ salilārthī tatra na praverteta?
SA15bsa071_u:475: yadi salilopalambhābhāvaḥ tadā kathamabhāvaḥ kasyacitpratipattiḥ pratipattiheturvā?
SA15bsa071_u:477: tasya tato vānyasya kasyacidapyapratipattāvapi yadyabhāvaḥ pratīyate tadā svāpamadamūrccāvyavadhānapṛṣṭhībhāvādyavasthāsvapi kiṃ na pratīyate?
SA15bsa071_u:479: tasmādayamanalaṃ paśyatrapi analo 'yaṃ salilam iti nādhyavasyatīti na tiṣṭhetrāpi pratiṣṭheta /
SA15bsa071_u:481: (4.9) tata evaikasya darśanād anyābhāvagatiścet kathamekaṃ dṛṣṭamanyatrāstīti pratyāyayati?
SA15bsa071_u:484: tasmāttīrādarśineva śakuninā dūraparyaṭayāpi pratyāgantavyamityalam avidyamānapratiṣṭhānayā diśaḥ pratipattyā /
SA15bsa071_u:485: (4.10) yadyekapariccedādevānyavyavaccedaḥ sidhyati tadā sarvasyānyasya aviśeṣeṇa tatrābhāvasiddhirbhavet /
SA15bsa071_u:489: (4.11) ekātmapariccedāt tasya tadanyātmavyavaccedo bhavati tadātmaniyatapratibhāsajñānāt na hi tadātmā tadanyasyātmā bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:490: anyātmāvyavaccede pravṛttinivṛttyoḥ abhāva iti pūrvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:491: taṃ ca deśakālasvabhāvāvasthāniyataṃ tadātmanopalabhamānā buddhiḥ tathātvapracyutimasya vyavaccinati /
SA15bsa071_u:493: yadi anyathābhāvo vyavaccinno bhavatiḥ tathātvaṃ ca tasyaiva bhavati nānyasyeti anyathābhūtāttathābhūtaṃ vyavaccindatyeva tat pariccinati /
SA15bsa071_u:497: tasya tadanyatayā vyāptyabhāve tena tadarthāvyavaccedātpunarapi bhāvasyāpariccedaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa071_u:500: tṛtīyaprakārābhāvaṃ ca sūcayati iti ekapramāṇavyāpāra eṣaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:501: tathāhi kvacitpramāṇaṃ pravṛtaṃ tadeva tadanyasmād vyavaccinattī,
SA15bsa071_u:503: tadanyadeva ca tasmād vyavaccinatti anyasya tatra apariccedāt /
SA15bsa071_u:513: (4.13) anyabhāvaviṣayasyopalabdhirapi tadabhāvasya sādhikeṣṭaiva na tu liṅgatvena /
SA15bsa071_u:516: na hi anyasya bhāvaṃ pratipadya tatpratipatteḥ anvayavyatirekau prasādhya tadabhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
SA15bsa071_u:517: kiṃ tarhi? tadanyaṃ pratipadyamāna eva tadabhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
SA15bsa071_u:518: darśanānantaram idamasti idaṃ tu nāsti iti vyavasthāpanāt /
SA15bsa071_u:519: tacca tasya liṅgaṃ bhavati yasyānvayi vyatireko ca /
SA15bsa071_u:521: na hi evaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ yatra anyabhāvopalabdhistatra tadabhāvaḥ iti /
SA15bsa071_u:524: kiṃtu saiva tadanyabhāvopalabdhiḥ sādhyadharmasya sādhiketi anavasthā dṛṣṭāntānāmityapratipattiḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:526: so 'nyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇenānupalambhena siddhaḥ san mūḍhapratipattāvabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayed iti alaṃ prasaṅgena /
SA15bsa071_u:531: sa tathā siddhaḥ san kāryavyāpyayorabhāvam abhāvavyavahāraṃ vā sādhayati /
SA15bsa071_u:532: svabhāvānupalabdhau tu anupalabdhyā liṅgabhūtayā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate /
SA15bsa071_u:533: (4.15) yadi kāraṇavyāpakau tadanyabhāvasiddhayānupalabdhyā siddhāsad vyavahārāvanyasyābhāvamabhāvavyavahāṃra ca sādhayataḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:534: sā ca tayorupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāvevāsadvyavahārasya sādhiketi kathaṃ tayoḥ parokṣe 'rtheprayogaḥ?
SA15bsa071_u:537: kevalaṃ kāraṇavyāpakayorhi siddhasambandhayoryadyabhāvaḥ parasyāpi avaśyamabhāvaḥ iti etasya darśanārthamete prayujyete iti /
SA15bsa071_u:538: eṣa eva pakṣadharmo 'nvayavyatirekavān iti tadaṃśena vyāptaḥ trilakṣaṇa eva trividha eva heturgamakaḥ svaśādhyadharmāvyabhicārāt /
SA15bsa071_u:540: trīṇi caitāni abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ jñātatvaṃ ceti /
SA15bsa071_u:541: tatrābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ tāvat pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
SA15bsa071_u:543: avinābhāvo hi satyeva sādhyadharme bhāvo hetoḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:544: sa hetustallakṣaṇaḥ dharmiṇi syād atra ca sādhyadharmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet?
SA15bsa071_u:545: pratyakṣānumāne hi sādhyadharmaṃ bādhamāne taṃ dharmiṇo niṣkāsayataḥ tasmiṃśca satyeva heturbhavan taṃ tatraivāvasthāpayatīti paraṃ bata bhāvānāmasvāsthyam /
SA15bsa071_u:546: anyatra sādhyadharmeṇāvinābhāvī heturna punaḥ sādhyadharmiṇeveti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:547: tat kimayaṃ tapasvī śaṇḍhamudvāhya putraṃ mṛgayate?
SA15bsa071_u:551: syādetad, yata eva heturanyathāpi bhavedata eva pramāṇābhyāmabādhitadharmā dharmītyucyata iti /
SA15bsa071_u:554: bādhāyāmapi sādhyābhāvasya tena sādhanāt kutaḥ sādhanasya sāmarthyam /
SA15bsa071_u:556: bādhakapramāṇasyābhāvaḥ sādhyābhāvasya ca saṃbhavaḥ syāditi na sāmarthyamabādhāyāḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:558: kiṃ tarhi? bādhāyā anupalabdhiḥ sā ca puruṣasya kvacid bādhāyāḥ saṃbhave 'pi syāditi sa hetuprayogasya viṣayaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:559: kiṃ nu vai heturbādhopalabdherbibheti na punarbādhāyā yena bādhāmanādṛtya tadanupalabdhau prayoktavya iṣṭaḥ?
SA15bsa071_u:560: sa tarhi paramārthena- 'bādhā kimasti nāsti' ityanapekṣya bādhāyā anupalabdhau prayoktavyaḥ?
SA15bsa071_u:563: sa kiṃ kvacit satyāmapi bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayed yenāsyā abhāvaniścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuśca pratyujyate /
SA15bsa071_u:564: evaṃ ca sati abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
SA15bsa071_u:567: yathā ca bādhānupalabdhau tāmabhyupagamya prayujyate tathā tadupalabdhāvapi prayujyatām,
SA15bsa071_u:569: (5.4) na bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyamiti cet /
SA15bsa071_u:578: upalambhasya nivṛttāvapi bādhāyā anivṛttau tadavasthaṃ hetorasāmarthyamityaprayogaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:579: tasmāt svasādhyabhāvābhāvādhyāmanyathāpi bhavanhetuḥ dharmiṇi na kiñcidbhāvayati na vibhāvayati iti tadupakṣepo na samarthaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:582: (5.5) tatrāma tasmād viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ bhavet lakṣaṇāntaratvena copādānamarhati yasya bhāve 'pi yasya aparasyābhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa071_u:583: tadyathā pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe ca bhāva iti /
SA15bsa071_u:584: n acaitad abādhāyā avinābhāve sati sambhavati iti na sādhyaviparyayāvinābhāvinorhetuviruddhayorviṣaye bādhā saṃbhavati iti na tadabhāvaḥ pṛthaganayorlakṣaṇāntaratvena vācyaḥ /
SA15bsa071_u:585: tasmād hetoḥ prayoge pratijñādoṣāṇāṃ saṃbhavo nāsti /
SA15bsa071_u:589: katham? eko hi hetuḥ svasādhyabhāva eva bhavediti tatrāvyabhicārī tatraiva tasmādanyo 'pi kathaṃ heturbhavati?
SA15bsa071_u:590: ekasya yat sādhyaṃ tadabādhakasya dharmasya bhāva eva bhāvāditi bādhayā samānam /
SA15bsa071_u:591: (5.7) api ca / kiṃ yo vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetuḥ sa samyagjñānasya viparyayasya vā heturiṣṭa āhosvidapradarśitapratihetuḥ? kiṃ cātaḥ?
SA15bsa071_u:593: na hi aniścitātmanaḥ pratipādakadharmasya tallakṣaṇatvaṃ yathā sandigdhasya pakṣadharmatvasya /
SA15bsa071_u:594: nāpi sandigdhalakṣaṇo heturbhavediti na kaścid heturbhavet /
SA15bsa071_u:595: tulye lakṣaṇe di dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ saṃbhavo 'dṛṣṭapratiyogiṣu api śaṃkāmutpādayati viśeṣābhāvāt /
SA15bsa071_u:596: sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣo hetorlakṣaṇam /
SA15bsa071_u:597: yatastadviśeṣād heturekāntena nirastapratipakṣaḥ svasādhyaṃ niścāyayatīti atallakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt tathā ca vyarthā ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā /
SA15bsa071_u:598: ato viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo lakṣaṇaṃ hīyeta svalakṣaṇayuktayorhetvorekatra dharmiṇi virodhenopanipāte sati viruddhāvyabhicārī iti /
SA15bsa071_u:599: (5.8) na ca tasya viśeṣasya svarūpaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ,
SA15bsa071_u:601: tasmātrāstyevaṃ viśeṣa iti sarvatra śaṅkayā bhavitavyam /
SA15bsa071_u:602: dṛṣṭapratihetorapi hetoḥ prāgitareṇa na kaścidviśeṣo lakṣyate /
SA15bsa071_u:608: "yadā tarhi śabdatvaṃ nityamabhyupagaccati tadāyaṃ hetureva syād yadyatra anityatvahetuṃ kṛtakatvādi kaścitra darśayed " iti /
SA15bsa071_u:610: nyāyamanupālayadbhirasaṃvaraṇīyamiti kaṣṭataraṃ vyasanaṃ kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta?
